𓅜 𓐍 𓏏 𓏥 | what is good | agade ⲁⲅⲁⲑⲟⲥ agathos अच्छा acchā 𓅜 Agathodaemén 𓅜 𓐍 𓏏 𓏳 see Pharaoh king list 𓅜 𐌰𐌷𐌰 ≈ 𓄿 𓐍 | spirit | 𓂔 a'Ka | 𓂓 𓏤 | soul, spirit 𓅜 𐌰𐌷𐌰 aḫa spirit, mind, reason •Good God

𓊹𓊹𓊹 Dryhten "Lord" From Proto-Germanic *druhtinaz. Cognate with Old Frisian drochten, Old Saxon drohtin, Old High German truhtin, Old Norse dróttinn. *druhtiz band of troop, "director" drag duce ≠ *dʰrewgʰ Trug

𓅝 𓏏 𓏮 𓀭 | Thoth | ḏḥwt Drihten = "God" @ Anglo-Saxon 995

ⲛⲟⲩϫ ↔ ⲛⲓϣϯ great ⲛⲟⲩϯ mf. (any) GOD; adj. godly, divine PATER NOSTER ⲛⲟⲩⲧⲉ NATURE ⲫⲛⲟⲩϯ m. god ⲁⲧⲛⲟⲩϯ adj. godless ⲉⲣⲁⲧⲛⲟⲩϯ be godless ⲙⲉⲧⲛⲟⲩϯ f. divinity ⲙⲁⲓⲛⲟⲩϯ n. god-loving ⲙⲉⲧⲙⲁⲓⲛⲟⲩϯ f. godliness, piety ⲙⲁⲥⲛⲟⲩϯ f. god-bearing, mother ofgod (virgin mary) ⲣⲉϥⲙⲉⲥⲛⲟⲩϯ n. god-bearer ⲙⲁⲥⲧⲉⲛⲟⲩϯ n. god-hater ⲉⲣⲛⲟⲩϯ be god ϣⲁⲙϣⲉⲛⲟⲩϯ n. serving god; god-server ⲙⲉⲧϣⲁⲙϣⲉⲛⲟⲩϯ f. god-service,piety ⲣⲉϥϣⲉⲙϣⲉⲛⲟⲩϯ m. god-serving,pious person ⲣⲉϥϫⲫⲉⲛⲟⲩϯ n. god-bearer ⲛⲟϣⲉⲣ m. vulture, falcon

𓊹 𓈖 ≈ 𒉌𒉌 ì.lí ili ilī 𒀭 "gods" 𒉌𒉌 NIᵗʳ 𓇷 𓏏 𓊹 𓊹 𓊹 𓀭 𓏪 Ennead < 𓇸

𓊹 𓏏 𓂋 Peter баатар baatar “hero” < bogatyr <> Boga भगवान् bhagavān "God" 2.) Богъ Bogŭ Бог Bůh 𐔱𐔼𐕀𐔰𐕃𐕒𐕡𐕘 bixaʒ́uġ бурхан burxan ᠪᠤᠷᠬᠠᠨ burqan
